name: Le Petit Jardin
description:
Lowkey gardening with warm summer vibes. Explore, do a task or two, but most importantly put your feet up for a while on the bench, and take in the atmosphere.

Controls

  1. WASD - movement
  2. Mouse - look around
  3. Left Mouse button - interact
  4. Right Mouse button - cancel/drop held item

Gardening tools

  1. Shears - cut down the grass
  2. Watering can - revitalize dry areas and make everything grow faster
  3. Axe - chop some wood
  4. Pickaxe - crack some rocks
  5. Basket - get some apples

Made for Ludum Dare 51.

Please use Chrome when playing in browser or download the Windows version. The game does not work well with Firefox at the moment.
